did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: State budget records and other records relating to S.U.N.Y. the Commission on the Future of the Cornell Cooperative Extension Service with Robben Fleming as the chair, the Cornell Commission on Free Speech, and correspondence of James W. Spencer and M.C. Nesheim.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: State budget records and other records relating to S.U.N.Y. the Commission on the Future of the Cornell Cooperative Extension Service with Robben Fleming as the chair, the Cornell Commission on Free Speech, and correspondence of James W. Spencer and M.C. Nesheim.
Includes autobiographical data sheets compiled by Dr. Spencer reflecting on his life, achievements, and influences.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Commission on Free Speech.
Cornell University. Office of the Vice Provost.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Boxes 1, 6 , 7 and 10 are restricted to permission of the Office of the Vice Provost.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: James W. Spencer Papers, #4-2-2136. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
